title: FC Versailles 78 - Wikipedia
snippet: The club is an official academy of the French Football Federation. Since 2024, the club has been partially owned by French Formula One driver Pierre Gasly. FC Versailles was formed in 1989 as the result of a merger between Racing Club Versailles and Companion Sports Versailles.

title: r/formula1 on Reddit: Pierre Gasly becomes the 3rd partner owner of FC Versailles
snippet: The board will promise you a 100m budget and a new stadium, but what they really mean is 100 euros and 45 new seats ... FC Versailles is proud to welcome Pierre Gasly, French Formula 1 driver, as its third owner partner.

title: Pierre Gasly steps into football ownership with FC Versailles
snippet: Pierre Gasly has acquired a stake in FC Versailles, a French football club competing in the third tier of the country's football pyramid, the National.

title: Formula 1 driver Pierre Gasly becomes French football club's co-owner
snippet: Formula 1 driver Pierre Gasly has become co-owner of FC Versailles, a semi-professional French football club based near Paris.

title: Pierre Gasly buys stake in semi-pro French football club FC Versailles | The Independent
snippet: He will bring us his very high level knowledge and his humilityâ€¦ I am certain that our collaboration will be fruitful. Pierre Gasly has bought a stake in French third division club FC Versailles (Getty Images)
